#include <stdio.h>
#include <string.h>

#define MOD 1000000007
#define MAX_N 20
#define MAX_T 25

int main() {
    // First part
    int vamshi, z;
    scanf("%d %d", &vamshi, &z);
    int result1 = (vamshi / z + 1) * z;

    // Convert result1 to string S_str
    char S_str[25];
    sprintf(S_str, "%d", result1);
    int n = strlen(S_str);

    // Second part: DP
    long long dp[MAX_N][13];
    for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
        for (int k = 0; k < 13; k++) {
            dp[i][k] = 0;
        }
    }

    for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
        if (i == 0) {
            if (S_str[0] != '?') {
                int digit = S_str[0] - '0';
                dp[i][digit] = 1;
            } else {
                for (int j = 0; j < 10; j++) {
                    dp[i][j] += 1;
                }
            }
        } else {
            char current_char = S_str[i];
            if (current_char != '?') {
                int digit = current_char - '0';
                for (int k = 0; k < 13; k++) {
                    int new_remainder = (k * 10 + digit) % 13;
                    dp[i][new_remainder] += dp[i-1][k];
                }
            } else {
                for (int j = 0; j < 10; j++) {
                    for (int k = 0; k < 13; k++) {
                        int new_remainder = (k * 10 + j) % 13;
                        dp[i][new_remainder] += dp[i-1][k];
                    }
                }
            }
        }

        // Apply mod to all entries
        for (int k = 0; k < 13; k++) {
            dp[i][k] %= MOD;
        }
    }

    long long result2 = dp[n-1][5];

    // Convert result2 to string s_str
    char s_str[25];
    sprintf(s_str, "%lld", result2);
    int m = strlen(s_str);

    // Third part processing
    char t[MAX_T];
    int t_index = 0;
    int i = 0;
    while (i < m) {
        char c = s_str[i];
        if (c == 'A') {
            t[t_index++] = 'A';
            i++;
        } else if (c == 'B') {
            if (i < m-1 && s_str[i+1] == 'C') {
                t[t_index++] = 'D';
                i +=2;
            } else {
                t[t_index++] = 'X';
                i++;
            }
        } else {
            t[t_index++] = 'X';
            i++;
        }
    }
    t[t_index] = '\0';

    // Compute total
    int total = 0;
    int numA = 0;
    for (int j = 0; j < t_index; j++) {
        char current = t[j];
        if (current == 'X') {
            numA = 0;
        } else {
            if (current == 'A') {
                numA += 1;
            } else {
                total += numA;
            }
        }
    }

    printf("%d\n", total);

    return 0;
}
